sentences.en: a bang on the head
sentences.cn: 头上一记猛烈的撞击

sentences.en: a deafeningly loud bang
sentences.cn: 震耳欲聋的巨响

sentences.en: All up and down the street the windows bang shut.
sentences.cn: 整条街的窗户都砰然关上了。

sentences.en: banged away at the project until it was finished.
sentences.cn: 在项目完成前一直埋头苦干

sentences.en: banged up the car.
sentences.cn: 撞坏了汽车

sentences.en: For once you leave bang on time for work.
sentences.cn: 你终于有一次准点上班去了。

sentences.en: He looks bang on with his early judgment.
sentences.cn: 他之前的判断看起来分毫不差。

sentences.en: he was banging away at his novel.
sentences.cn: 他正为自己的小说不懈努力。

sentences.en: Her career began with a bang in 1986.
sentences.cn: 1986年，她的事业一炮打响。

sentences.en: I didn't mean to bang into you.
sentences.cn: 我不是故意撞你的。

sentences.en: I heard an almighty bang.
sentences.cn: 我听到一声巨响。

sentences.en: my first thought when I heard the news was ‘Bang goes my knighthood!’.
sentences.cn: 我听到那个消息第一反应是“我封不了爵士了！”。

sentences.en: Of course, slap-bang in the middle of town the rents are high.
sentences.cn: 当然啦，市区正中心的租金是很高的。

sentences.en: She slammed the door with a bang.
sentences.cn: 她砰的一声摔上了门。

sentences.en: some people get a bang out of reading that stuff.
sentences.cn: 有些人从看那东西中得到乐趣。

sentences.en: Suddenly there was a loud bang.
sentences.cn: 忽然传来一声巨响。

sentences.en: The baby kept banging the table with his spoon.
sentences.cn: 宝宝不停地拿调羹敲桌子。

sentences.en: The bang came suddenly, echoing across the buildings, shattering glass.
sentences.cn: 突如其来的一声巨响在建筑物间回荡着，震碎了玻璃。

sentences.en: the day starts with a bang—the steep climb to the mountain top.
sentences.cn: 艰难登顶——那一天就这样惊心动魄地开始了。

sentences.en: the government banged on about competition, efficiency, and the free market.
sentences.cn: 政府喋喋不休大谈竞争、效率和自由市场。

sentences.en: the programme is bang on about the fashion world.
sentences.cn: 那节目完全符合时装界情况。

sentences.en: the programme is bang on about the fashion world.
sentences.cn: 那节目完全符合时装界情况。

sentences.en: the remark brought me down to earth with a bang.
sentences.cn: 那句话突然把我带回了现实。

sentences.en: The television went bang.
sentences.cn: 电视机发出砰的一声巨响。

sentences.en: There was a huge bang; it sounded like a supersonic jet.
sentences.cn: 传来一声巨响，听起来像是超音速喷气式飞机的声音。

sentences.en: There was a loud bang outside the kitchen door.
sentences.cn: 厨房门外传来砰的一声巨响。

sentences.en: They watched the dodgem cars bang and bounce.
sentences.cn: 他们看着那些碰碰车互相碰撞并弹开。

sentences.en: they weren't banging out ads in my day the way they are now.
sentences.cn: 我那个年代他们可没像今天这样拼命做广告。

sentences.en: they've been banged up for something they didn't do.
sentences.cn: 他们以莫须有的罪名被关进监狱。

sentences.en: This production is bang up-to-date.
sentences.cn: 这个产品是全新的。

words.tran_cn: 直接地；砰然地；突然巨响地

phrases.tran_cn: 努力地通常是长久地工作
(非正式， 主 美)花钱换得价值
(英， 非正式)完全正确；完全符合
(英， 非正式)把（某人）关进监狱

phrases.phrase: bang something out informal 非正式

phrases.tran_cn: n. 宇宙大爆炸；创世大爆炸
(非正式， 主 北美)从…中得到刺激或乐趣

trans.tran_en: to close something violently, making a loud noise, or to be closed in this way
a painful blow to the body when you hit against something or something hits you

trans.tran_cn: 撞，猛击，发出巨响，砰地关上，猛然放下
trans.tran_en: to hit something hard, making a loud noise

trans.tran_cn: 猛击， 猛撞； 发出砰的一声， 砰砰地响
trans.tran_en: to hit something hard, making a loud noise
to hit something hard, making a loud noise
